nodes.text: The D-09 Corruption Droid was a model of battle droid that was used by the Dread Host, the armies of the Dread Masters during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. D-09 Corruption Droids and similar models were stationed at the Dread Fortress under the command of the droid Corruptor Zero, and fought to defend the fortress during the Dread War.
D-09 Corruption Droids appear as enemies in the Operation "The Dread Fortess" in the 2011 BioWare video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel.
